title: Sell Stuff Even If You Suck At Selling With Carlos Redlich
itunes:title: Sell Stuff Even If You Suck At Selling With Carlos Redlich
description:
Carlos Redlich is a highly sought after direct-response copywriter and marketing consultant.

As he travels the world and learns about new cultures, Carlos' primary mission is to deliver as much value as possible to his fellow marketers and copywriters... in an authentic and straightforward manner.
 
In this interview, Carlos lays out a bulletproof sales process that you can easily duplicate and will have you shaking your head yes.
 
Carlos's Free Training --> https://www.zacharybabcock.com/carlos-redlich
 
Learn More about the show --> https://underdogempowerment.com
